title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Douglas DC6 - Using the Giropilot/Autopilot
description:
Did you know the Douglas DC6 has a giropilot/autopilot? In this video we will have a look how to use the functionalities offered by the giropilot to  climb/decent and keep a specific altitude. In addition we are going to look at how we can change the direction of the airplane and even use the GPS to follow our flight plan and eventually land.

We depart from Murmansk airport runway 31 and will land on the same runway after making a short flight.
